select k.kincode, k.sido, s.sigungu, k.kinname, kk.kinkind, k.kinroom, k.kinmax, k.kincurrent, k.kinteacher, k.kinhome from kindergarten k, kinkind kk, sigungu s where k.sigungucode=s.sigungucode and k.kinkindcode=kk.kinkindcode and k.kinname like CONCAT('%',#{kinname},'%') and k.kinmax between #{i}
order by s.sigungu, k.kinname, kk.kinkind
